question.title: To reduce the risk of food-borne infection, what should be avoided?
question.description: Foods that should be avoided to prevent listeriosis and toxoplasmosis in non-immune women

option_a.title: Raw or undercooked poultry
option_a.description: A type of poultry that should be cooked before consumption

option_b.title: Raw or undercooked meats
option_b.description: Foods that should be handled and cooked before eating

option_c.title: All raw or undercooked meats
option_c.description: Meat products that require cooking before consumption

option_d.title: Raw or cooked meats
option_d.description: Meat products that can be consumed raw or cooked
